deprecated.title: The Schlage custom integration is deprecated
deprecated.description:
The Schlage integration will be native to Home Assistant starting with version 2023.9.0, and the custom integration will no longer be supported at that point.

Please remove the custom integration from your Home Assistant instance and then add the integration back using the native Home Assistant workflow.

The custom integration will be removed from Github in October 2023.
